Thank you for watching my poster(T134g)

ADAPTED TRANSFER PRINTING TECHNIQUE FOR

I will be presenting my poster at Tuesday Poster Session

  • Questions for Me

I am YUAN JIANG
from Tianjin University, China

I am a ph.D. student studying MEMS, This is my first time attending international conference, hope you would like my work!
My research direction and personal interest include:

Micro fabrication

With 2 years experience of design and fabrication piezoelectric MEMS device, I am very familiar with depostion, lithography, etching and other traditional MEMS process.

Flexible Electronics

I began my project towards flexible elctronics one year ago, now I am mainly focusing on the fabrication of flexible piezoelctronic devices by transfer printing technique.

Programming

Coding brings a lot of joy to me during my spare time, I like those codes and softwares which help making my life and work more organized and efficient.

This is where I study

lab members

We are a really a big family now, research topics of our group members inlcude micro and nano devices and its sensing and actuating applications

Clean Room

This is where I spend most of the time doing my experiment, people can only recognize each other from their eys in it.
